amendment.description: To require that all advanced imaging technology used as a primary screening method for passengers be equipped with automatic target recognition software.

vote.text: Amendment SA 51 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 51 proposed by Senator Udall NM. (consideration: CR S623-624; text: CR S623) To require that all advanced imaging technology used as a primary screening method for passengers be equipped with automatic target recognition software.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 51 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 51 proposed by Senator Udall NM.
